---
# Title must be 250 characters or less.
# Please use "title case" (capitalize all terms in the title except conjunctions, prepositions, and articles).
title: Title of Submission to PLOS Journals
author:
  - name: Name1 Surname
    affiliation: '1,2'
    equalcontrib: true
  - name: Name2 Surname
    affiliation: '2'
    equalcontrib: true
  - name: Name3 Surname
    affiliation: '2,3'
  - name: Name4 Surname
    corresponding: true
    affiliation: '1,2,3'
  - consortium: Lorem Ipsum Consortium
# Email adress of corresponding author (don't forget to set corresponding: true in the author list above for the corresponding author)
corresponding: correspondingauthor@institute.edu
# set equalcontrib: false if there are no equal contributions in your work
equalcontrib: true
# set consortium: false if there is no consortium involved
consortium: true
affiliation:
  - id: 1
    name: Institution Name
    department: Affiliation Dept/Program/Center
    address: City, State, Country
  - id: 2
    name: Institution Name
    department: Affiliation Dept/Program/Center
    address: City, State, Country
  - id: 3
    name: Institution Name
    department: Affiliation Dept/Program/Center
    address: City, State, Country
